snippet: Claudia Acuña's set was propulsive and polished, and the strongest creative force in the band was the guitarist Mike Moreno, who fashioned a fluent solo.
abstract: Claudia Acuña's set was propulsive and polished, and the strongest creative force in the band was the guitarist Mike Moreno, who fashioned a fluent solo.

headline.main: Winter Jazzfest: A New-World Meshing of Pop and Folk
